channel.title: Eclipse-Rsps 2.0 New Holiday events, dicing, new donor Zone, ect
channel.description:
I took the first version down because i wanted to host it again. I got bored with hosting though so im releaseing my newer version. I didnt add much tbh so really this should be version 1.5. ~what i added from last version~ all i added was holiday things for christmas and new years. I made a New Years event and Christmas Event and added Christmas tree at home. Like i said, no big changes. Im releasing the server with snow falling 24\7 if you dont want the snow, go to client.java and delete or add // infront of walkable interface(11877) Statuses like Super and Extreme donater are also added, set donater to 2 or 3 for these titles. ~Enjoy~ Comments and advise is appriciated :)
[img]http://i932.photobucket.com/albums/ad162/dominatorz93/santa.jpg[/img] [img]http://i932.photobucket.com/albums/ad162/dominatorz93/newtab.jpg[/img] [img]http://i932.photobucket.com/albums/ad162/dominatorz93/newyears.jpg[/img] [img]http://i932.photobucket.com/albums/ad162/dominatorz93/ella.jpg[/img] [img]http://i932.photobucket.com/albums/ad162/dominatorz93/dwarf.jpg[/img] [img]http://i932.photobucket.com/albums/ad162/dominatorz93/balloons.jpg[/img] [img]http://i932.photobucket.com/albums/ad162/dominatorz93/snow.jpg[/img] [img]http://i932.photobucket.com/albums/ad162/dominatorz93/sdsd.jpg[/img] [img]http://i932.photobucket.com/albums/ad162/dominatorz93/asasf.jpg[/img] [img]http://i932.photobucket.com/albums/ad162/dominatorz93/sdd.jpg[/img] [img]http://i932.photobucket.com/albums/ad162/dominatorz93/b.jpg[/img][img]http://i932.photobucket.com/albums/ad162/dominatorz93/aaaaa.jpg[/img] [img]http://i932.photobucket.com/albums/ad162/dominatorz93/aaaaaa.jpg[/img] [img]http://i932.photobucket.com/albums/ad162/dominatorz93/978.jpg[/img] [img]http://i932.photobucket.com/albums/ad162/dominatorz93/56.jpg[/img] [img]http://i932.photobucket.com/albums/ad162/dominatorz93/aa.jpg[/img] [img]http://i932.photobucket.com/albums/ad162/dominatorz93/aaaa.jpg[/img] [img]http://i932.photobucket.com/albums/ad162/dominatorz93/aaa.jpg[/img] [img]http://i932.photobucket.com/albums/ad162/dominatorz93/aaaaaa.jpg[/img]
~credits~ 70%HybridPvP/TorvaPkz 30%me ~Links~ Client- It seems ive misplaced my client :confused: so please use Hybrid pvP v3 client (It is webclient ready)- UppIT - Free File Sharing - Client.rar Source- http://www.mediafire.com/?9bw79n3qdgqpp69

What did you add to this that hasn’t been released as a tutorial? Don’t say objects either! This doesn’t look like anything special to me, but keep yourself motivated though.

I didnt use tuts! only for new years event! :mad:
[/quote]there is only one way to add monsters to an area, add objects, change a teleport ( donor zone ) :|[/quote]
what?
